name: Retropath Demo
description:
Retropath is a pixelated platformer taking place in an infinite dungeon. Explore the world as Valiant, the Rogue Knight.  The music being used is not the soundtrack that will be used for the final version. I will be making the world's longest videogame soundtrack (so over an hour long) specifically for this game.

At the original time of release the game is still in development, I am using the soundtrack Mysteria that I made. I am planning on adding a voiceover of the Dungeon Master (or should I say... the Retropath?)

Please comment any ideas you have, be it bosses, scoring suggestions, room layouts, Dungeon Master Phrases, Enemies, features, or playable characters.
